name: Enter The Cyberjungle
description:
Enter the Cyberjungle is a single-player, deckbuilding card game inspired by the rules of ----. Face a desperate struggle of skill and luck as you attempt to turn your pile of worthless digital cardboard heroes into a team that can defy the card game gods and win the Cyberjungle tournament.

Cool Stuff

Forge a deck containing your favorite card functions from NOWHERE IN PARTICULAR. Enjoy images created by an AI pumped full of LEGALLY ALLOWED SUBSTANCES. Listen to the finest in royalty-free synthwave.

Play With ALL The Cards

From the moment you buy Enter the Cyberjungle, you will be able to see and draft every card in the game. Every new card will be available as soon as it is released.

Pay Once, Play Forever

There will be no DLC. There will be no Microtransactions. You will not have to pay ten dollars a month to get the newest, best card in the game.

Designed To Be Customizable

Enter the Cyberjungle has been designed so that adding new cards and locations is as easy as changing a few text files. Create your own cards, add your own art, or make your own balance changes. For more information, see the README.txt file in the /Data folder of your game folder.
